channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Engineer
channel.description:
Type: Special Passive ability Hardworking: Immune to occupation Day ability Fire Work: Silence everyone for 10 seconds (3 uses) Demolition: After reworking 5 times. You can activate the trap, Killing everyone in the process tomorrow.(Ability can be used, whether in jail or being voted up)
Night Ability Rework: Engineer the castle (Infinite uses) Traps: Set up simple traps killing anyone who tries to visit you. You will be immune to death (3 Uses) Goal: Survive the game
Lol this class should be rare.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Engineer
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
Demolition seems ridiculous and almost impossible to play around.

Beyond that, even just traps seem like they’ll lead to too many random / arbitrary deaths. A neutral that isn’t even NK shouldn’t be causing so many deaths - it makes the game too random. They certainly shouldn’t have a power that nearly ends the game on the spot.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Engineer
item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
I support but agreed to op make it longer and inform bd that the castle looks fresh newer even

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Engineer
item.dc:creator: DavidIsSick
item.description:
Sounds like a really fun class but I think the rework should be longer, That seems a little to OP. Also maybe a notification will be released when the Engineer does rework, for example, “The Castle seems fresh, newer even.” Just some suggestions.

Read full topic
